targets.query:
from(bucket: "kvdb")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "key" and r.server == "myserver1")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "method", "key", "value"])
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)

from(bucket: "kvdb")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "quorum" and r.server == "myserver1")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "method", "key", "value"])
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

from(bucket: "kvdb")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "merkle")
  |> group(columns: ["partition", "server"])  // partition server 
  |> last()  //      
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["partition", "_value", "server"])  //   
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["partition"], columnKey: ["server"], valueColumn: "_value")  //

from(bucket: "kvdb")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "merkle")
  |> group(columns: ["partition", "server"])  // partition server 
  |> last()  //      
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["partition"], columnKey: ["server"], valueColumn: "_value")  //     
  |> keep(columns: ["partition", "myserver1", "myserver2", "myserver3", "myserver4", "myserver5", "myserver6"])  //   
  |> yield(name: "result")

from(bucket: "kvdb")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "handoff" and r.server == "myserver1")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["from", "key"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> unique(column: "key")
  |> group(columns: ["from"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "from", "key", "command"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.command == "KEEP")
  |> count(column: "key")
  |> group()

  |> group()

heartbeat_data = from(bucket: "kvdb")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "gossip" and r.from == "myserver1" and r._field == "heartbeat")
  |> group(columns: ["server"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "server", "_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "heartbeat"})

status_data = from(bucket: "kvdb")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "gossip" and r.from == "myserver1" and r._field == "status")
  |> group(columns: ["server"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "server", "_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "status"})

join(
  tables: {heartbeat: heartbeat_data, status: status_data},
  on: ["server", "_time"]
)
|> keep(columns: ["server", "heartbeat", "status", "_time"])
|>group()

from(bucket: "kvdb")
  |> range(start: -24h)  //     (:  1)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "merkle" and r["server"] == "myserver1")
  |> group(columns: ["partition"])
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: [ "_value", "partition", "_time"])  //
